hackathon-judges.judge-role: Director of Entrepreneurship (Monash University), Chief Executive Officer (STC Australia), Co-Founder (MedTech's Got Talent)
Deputy Dean of Medicine (Monash University), Deputy Director of Rheumatology (Monash Health)
Design and Innovation Program Manager (Austin Health)

hackathon-rules: Submissions must be posted before 1:45pm AEDT on the 29th of November.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The innovation we are carrying out is from an position of privilege. We wanted to dedicate our prizes to those around the world who are carrying out true medical innovation. The med_hack Grand Prize is dedicated to the Shadow Healthcare Staff of Aleppo, who continue to provide medical care in underground hospitals despite the danger to their lives and the civil war atrocities in Syria. Read more at
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: med_hack Grand Prize, dedicated to the Shadow Healthcare Staff of Aleppo

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The innovation we are carrying out is from an area of privilege. As part of our prizes, we wanted to dedicate them to those around the world who are carrying out true innovation. The med_hack Runner-Up prize is dedicated to the healthcare staff closing the gap for Indigenous Australians, who continue to improve the healthcare of Indigenous Australians around the country.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: med_hack Runner-Up, dedicated to the Healthcare Staff Closing the Gap for Indigenous Australians

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Awarded to the team with the most voted project on DevPost
Awarded to the two most promising young medical innovators
